track.name: Bell Bottom Blues
comments: This GOTTA BE the most beautiful song ever. Makes sorrow poetic.
yeah if this was a b-side to layla that was one hell of a 45rpm record.
b side 45 to layla...man,what a doubleshot  !
timeless as bell bottoms, okay. :)
Hand drums. And that immortal chorus - "I don't want to fade away..." I can never resist singing.
RESPECT!I DANCED THAT ON MY WEDDING DAY!
once i was strong but i lost the fight, you won't find a better loser :)
Ugh ugh ugh so much emotion
Bell Bottoms looked good then and now:):):)
the best blues rock ever
Classic.
great tune by slow hand....
Hands down, favorite Clapton tune.
One of his best.  Great song.
sloooooowwwww hand! so nice!
